derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French, named after Marshal de Plessis-Praslin (1598–1675), the French soldier whose cook invented it

entry.def: Praline is a sweet substance made from nuts cooked in boiling sugar. It is used in desserts and as a filling for chocolates.

means.word_mean: 1. cookie-sized candy made of brown sugar and butter and pecans
